title: Can I get 100 marks in one month in math? - Quora

response.answer_text: Getting 100% is very tough, but you can get more than 90% if you study smartly.I secured 90.40% and did it only by revising everything in the time gap between 2subjects. You can also do thisince you have ample timeStart revising everything on daily basis. Write social science answers in points, practice english writing sections in proper manner. Try to get 97+ in maths, scuence and social science.Revusion is the key. Try to wake up early at 4:00 am and revise till 7 am . this will help you immensly. At last its your efforts that will make a difference. Watch this

Yes. Keep revising and practice sample paper. The marks you obtain in sample paper . Final marks in your exam will be near this. So keep improving that topic in which you feel less confident. All the best.
Yes…Why not?By understanding Solved examples and solving examples from the problem set,you can achieve it.You should be consistent. Hope this helps.
